description: TfL physical and digital assets can supercharge your charity campaign

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Charities and their corporate sponsors now have access to a substantial suite of physical and digital TfL assets to boost their fundraising."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
We've long worked with charities to help them fundraise in our stations free of charge - many charities take advantage of this opportunity every year.
Now we're offering the chance to boost those campaigns. Depending on your brief and budget, our  commercial partners and the charities they support benefit from bespoke access to:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["World-famous intellectual property","An extensive network of experiential sites","Press, social media and digital support","Unique filming and photography locations"]}

{"template":"carousel","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"carousel":[{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/poppy-day-train.jpg","alt":"Wrapped underground carriage: Poppy Day"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/buxton-water-roundel.jpg","alt":"London Marathon sponsor Buxton Water renamed Canada Water Underground Station 'Buxton Water' on Marathon Day"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/canary-wharf-poppies.jpg","alt":"Canary Wharf Station entrance vinyl: Poppy Day"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/help-for-heroes.jpg","alt":"Help for Heroes: Tottenham Court Road station"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/race-for-life-handouts.jpg","alt":"Experiential site Waterloo station: Cancer Research UK"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/race-for-live-tube-train-wrap.jpg","alt":"Wrapped underground carriage: Race for Life"}],"wrapped":false}
We work with brands and agencies to tailor bespoke campaigns, large and small which attract our customers and make their journeys engaging and fun.
We also ensure that our customers' experience of every campaign meets each brand's specific business objectives.
Examples of successful and award winning TfL Commercial Partnerships are in Driving London's Happiness.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Driving London's happiness - our commercial partnership lookbook","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/driving-londons-happiness.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 3.00MB","image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/driving-londons-happiness-img.png","alt":"Driving London happiness"}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
To find out how we can help you supercharge your charity fundraising efforts, please email commercialpartnerships@tfl.gov.uk or call us on 020 3054 4570 ( TfL call charges ).
